duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze data to derive insights and tell stories for product, marketing, and web analytics.
Educate, instill confidence, and motivate others to act on data-driven recommendations.
Guide and support A/B testing or other experimentation frameworks, and interpret results to draw practical conclusions.
Conversion of requirements into use cases and test cases.
Certify quality changes and drive User Acceptance Tests (UATs).
Expertise in Karate/Rest Assured & Postman functional automation frameworks is desirable.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Analytics, Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
